statements.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD AS USER_PWD , FAIL_CNT FROM E3_USER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #USER_ID#
SELECT MESSAGE_ID , LANGUAGE_ID , MESSAGE_TYPE , MESSAGE FROM E3_MESSAGE
statements.update: UPDATE E3_USER SET FAIL_CNT = FAIL_CNT + 1 WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
UPDATE E3_USER SET FAIL_CNT = 0 WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO E3_LOG(LOG_ID, LOG_TYPE, PROGRAM_ID, ERROR_MESSAGE, USER_ID, IPADDRESS, REG_DATE) VALUES(#LOG_ID#, #LOG_TYPE#, #PROGRAM_ID#, #ERROR_MESSAGE#, #USER_ID#, #IPADDRESS#, SYSDATE)
